alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ARCHES/GRAND FLAT...TAVAPUTS PLATEAU...AND CANYONLANDS/NATURAL BRIDGES COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 232 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 29 miles northeast of Green River to 15 miles northwest of Canyonlands National Park and moving east at 25 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Moab around 325 PM MDT. Castle Valley around 330 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 170 and 220. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 120 and 157. Utah 128 between mile markers 0 and 18, and between mile markers 36 and 44. Utah 279 between mile markers 0 and 15. Utah 313 between mile markers 0 and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges
